marklogic.body:
Very amusing, even though I haven't seen the show! I love this concept; dog freak that I am, I'm Always pondering what my favorite characters and people would be in canine form. ;) Lucky Ken, getting to be a Borzoi. x3 Fine description! However, Bertram there ain't bad-looking in either pic...I could show you a boatload of Chinese Cresteds for whom "unattractive" would be the LAST adjective in the world!Â
Not sure about the Cavvie, but I can definitely assure you that the Beagle is Spot-on. BasedÂ upon stories of her childhood Cocker, I think my mom could support that assessment somewhat as well. What I'd like to know is...how did a Vizsla and a Pomeranian produce a Cocker spaniel? *lol*
